1900490.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900490
In-book reference  : Book 7, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 7, Hadith 001
1900490.text: Ibn 'Abbas reported that the Prophet said (Allah bless him and give him peace): "Color the edges of the eyelids with antimony [ithmid], for it clears the vision and makes the eyelashes grow!” He also maintained that the Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) had a kohl jar from which he used to apply kohl to his eyelashes every night, three times in this [eye],and three times in that.

1900500.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900500
In-book reference  : Book 7, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 7, Hadith 002
1900500.text: Ibn 'Abbas said: “Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to color the edges of his eyelids with antimony before going to sleep, three times in each eye. Yazid ibn Harun also said in his tradition: “The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) had a kohl jar from which he used to apply kohl to his eyelashes before going to sleep, three times in each eye.”

1900510.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900510
In-book reference  : Book 7, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 7, Hadith 003
1900510.text: Jabir (i.e. Ibn Abdillah) said: "Allah’s Messenger said (Allah bless him and give him peace): “You must apply antimony before going to sleep, for it clears the vision and makes the eyelashes grow.”

1900520.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900520
In-book reference  : Book 7, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 7, Hadith 004
1900520.text: Ibn "Abbas said: "Allah’s Messenger said (Allah bless him and give him peace): 'The best of your eye salves is antimony, for it clears the vision and makes the eyelashes grow.'”

1900530.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900530
In-book reference  : Book 7, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 7, Hadith 005
1900530.text: Ibn 'Umar said: "You must apply antimony, for it clears the vision and makes the eyelashes grow.”
